title: (Youth Bible School 2007) A Chosen Generation
description: God has always desired to have a precious, peculiar people unto Himself. We can be a joy and treasure to God. He has promised that if we will come out from among the world and separate ourselves unto Him, He will be a father unto us, and we His sons and daughters.

title: (Youth Bible School 2007) A Holy Nation
description: Are you a patriot? Are you willing to give your life for your nation? Which one? Really, there's only two choices. God's holy nation, made up of the followers of King Jesus, and the kingdom of this world.

title: (Youth Bible School 2007) A Purchased Possession
description: There is something about this holy Kingdom of God that sets it so far apart from any religion, so much higher than an empty set of dry doctrines. The King loves you! The King loves you and is jealous of your love and affection. Behold, what manner of love is this!

title: (Youth Bible School 2007) A Royal Priesthood
description: What does it really mean to be priests unto God? What is expected, and what are the blessed privileges? Find out more as Brother Dean shares about this powerful metaphor that should affect every area of our lives.

title: (Youth Bible School 2007) Holy
description: We need a clear understanding of the holiness of God. God is holy, and He must be the standard by which we measure our lives. Because of Who God is, He desires us to be a holy people unto Himself, separate and set apart to God.
